kuinka helvetissä tämän saa toimimaan? How can i get this to work?

You need a program that reads .iso files like CD burners or IsoBuster, then you extract the files to your pc and then you burn them to a CD, when you have the 3 CDs you simply install it.
When you have finished installing the game you need to copy the crack that comes in the crack folder. Replace the MOH_spearhead.exe from the game instalation folder with the MOH_spearhead.exe (cracked) and thats all.
--Look for the serial.txt file to get the installation code---
